title: Why
body: RIOT why did i get leaverbuster for leaving a custom game FULL OF BOTS

replies.body:
That sounds like a strange bug maybe?

Are you sure you're not talking about [this](https://i.gyazo.com/93abdc9edcc3f42fe5bc7304d61d1786.png) notification? Or did you actually get a LeaverBuster low priority queue?
i actually got leaverbuster this is the third time its happened its pissing me off

Hey man, 

I still recommend you follow this up with your own [**Riot** support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ticket, but my **Riot** support contact said you got your LeaverBuster from a Normal Blind Pick match. 

> **Here's what I think happened:**
> 
> You got LeaverBuster in your normal game as **Ryze**. You then played 3 custom games where you were unaware you had LeaverBuster, but once you went to play bots you got a LeaverBuster low priority queue that was still there from the **Ryze** game. 

> Essentially, you thought you had received the LeaverBuster off the customs, when in fact it was still there from your recent normal game as **Ryze**.
thanks mbro i think i know why i got it. thanks for finding info out on it now i know not to leave games

Lemme ask around for you :D 
In the mean time there's no harm in asking [**Riot** support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) why this is happening.
